CB-404
Carrying Case
Home

CB-404
Home
CB-404
Features	Specs	Support
Custom Carrying Case for the SP-404 Series

The CB-404 is the official carrying case for the Roland SP-404MKII and previous models in the iconic SP-404 portable sampler series. Streamlined and rugged, it features a semi-rigid EVA shell with a tough polyester exterior and a moveable internal partition that creates separate compartments for the sampler and items such as an AC adaptor. There’s also a detachable pouch for small items, plus a shoulder strap with a wide adjustment range. As a bonus, we’ve also included four orange knobs for customizing the look of the SP-404MKII model.

Standard Features
Custom carrying case for the Roland SP-404 sampler series
Compatible models: SP-404MKII, SP-404A, SP-404SX, and SP-404
Light-yet-protective design with semi-rigid EVA shell
Detachable internal fabric pouch for storing small accessories
Moveable partition for storage of an AC adaptor and other items
Detachable shoulder strap
Heavy-duty zipper and pull with the Roland logo
Includes four orange knobs to customize the look of the SP-404MKII (not compatible with other models)
Create with Confidence

Roland SP samplers are the bona fide kings of performance-based beatmaking, celebrated for their distinctive sound and ability to create rapid-fire beats anywhere. With the CB-404, you can be sure your SP instrument is well protected no matter where you travel.

Light and Rugged

The CB-404’s semi-rigid EVA exterior provides durable protection with reduced weight. An internal partition is secured with hook-and-loop attachments, allowing you to adjust the compartment sizes for different SP-404 models and various accessories. A detachable pouch is fitted into the lid for stowing other small items and features a soft fabric material to protect the sampler’s faceplate.

Versatile Strap Design

The CB-404 includes a tough shoulder strap with a wide adjustment range for different traveling styles. And when you want to carry the case by hand or stow it in a larger bag, simply remove the strap with the easy-to-detach clips.

Custom Knobs

Many creators like to personalize the knobs and faceplate on the SP-404MKII to match their mood or style. The CB-404 comes with a set of four knobs in classic orange, allowing you to change up the look of your sampler in seconds.

Note: The included knob set only works with the SP-404MKII model and is not available separately.
